content: --ज {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} produced in a field. {2} born from the body. (--जः one of the 12 kinds of sons allowed by the old Hindu Law, the offspring of a wife by a kinsman duly appointed to raise up issue to the husband; <ls>Ms. 9. 167</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 9.">180</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 69</ls>, <ls n="Y.">2. 128.</ls>
